name: map_dvd
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
N : Type u_2
inst✝³ : Semigroup M
inst✝² : Semigroup N
F : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : FunLike F M N
inst✝ : MulHomClass F M N
f : F
a b : M
a✝ : Dvd.dvd a b
⊢ Dvd.dvd (f a) (f b)
decl:
theorem map_dvd [Semigroup M] [Semigroup N] {F : Type*} [FunLike F M N] [MulHomClass F M N]
    (f : F) {a b} : a ∣ b → f a ∣ f b
  | ⟨c, h⟩ => ⟨f c, h.symm ▸ map_mul f a c⟩

name: MulHom.map_dvd
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
N : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Semigroup M
inst✝ : Semigroup N
f : MulHom M N
a b : M
a✝ : Dvd.dvd a b
⊢ Dvd.dvd (f a) (f b)
decl:
theorem MulHom.map_dvd [Semigroup M] [Semigroup N] (f : M →ₙ* N) {a b} : a ∣ b → f a ∣ f b :=
  _root_.map_dvd f

name: MonoidHom.map_dvd
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
N : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Monoid M
inst✝ : Monoid N
f : MonoidHom M N
a b : M
a✝ : Dvd.dvd a b
⊢ Dvd.dvd (f a) (f b)
decl:
theorem MonoidHom.map_dvd [Monoid M] [Monoid N] (f : M →* N) {a b} : a ∣ b → f a ∣ f b :=
  _root_.map_dvd f
